description: The Raid men's 3/4 pants are designed for those who are tough on their clothes. Designed in a stretchy and breathable fabric that is resistant to water, wind, and abrasion, these outdoor pants will become the best friend of those who love to play outside. Ideal for travel or hiking, these casual pants dry quickly and protect against the sun's rays with an anti-uv finish.
name: Chlorophylle Raid 3/4 Pants - Mens
